name: National Aviation Academy (Milli Aviasiya Akademiyası)
about: The National Aviation Academy (Milli Aviasiya Akademiyası) is a public higher education institution in Azerbaijan, established in 1992 as part of Azerbaijan Airlines. It provides highly qualified specialists in civil aviation and other aerospace fields, meeting international standards. The academy offers higher, additional, and professional specialization training programs and is accredited by the Ministry of Education of the Republic of Azerbaijan. It includes facilities such as the Pilot Training Center, Civil Aviation Museum, and the International Air Transport Association Institute. The academy is committed to training professionals in aviation management, aviation special equipment, and English language, among other areas, ensuring they are well-prepared for careers in the aerospace sector. The National Aviation Academy continues to play a crucial role in developing Azerbaijan's civil aviation industry.
